title: Technology-Enhanced Learning Design for IoT-Based Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Museum-linked experiential learning simulations utilizing IoT sensors in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can formulate and validate scientific hypotheses using IoT sensor data
Learners design learning scenarios connecting virtual/physical environments using model-based development tools
Learners can record and reflect on collaborative problem-solving processes according to the activity theory framework
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
